General.Name: Rukun Raharja Tbk
General.Description: PT Rukun Raharja Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated energy provider in Indonesia. It is involved in trading of natural gas and CNG; transportation of gas; maintenance and operations of gas infrastructure; gas compression services, clean water treatment services; and management of LPG terminal facilities. The company also offers management and business consulting services, as well as engages in power generation, mining, trading, and construction activities. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Office Park Thamrin Residences, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10220
